subject: Tennis
United States Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: The 2000 U.S. Open champion Marat Safin showed little fire in his first-round loss to Jürgen Melzer, but after the match he spoke passionately about his younger sister, Dinara Safina.
snippet: The 2000 U.S. Open champion Marat Safin showed little fire in his first-round loss to Jürgen Melzer, but after the match he spoke passionately about his younger sister, Dinara Safina.
